summary: This document appears to be a quarterly roster or daily assignment log for an employee named T. Noel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering the third quarter of 2019. It details shift assignments, leave types (administrative, sick, annual), and unit postings (e.g., SHU, 9 NORTH, 10 SOUTH) for the period from June to September 2019.

keyFacts: This is a staff assignment log for MCC New York employee T. Noel for Q3 2019.
The log shows various types of leave: Administrative Leave, Sick Leave, Annual Leave, and Leave Without Pay (LWOP).
Assignments include posts in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and other units like '9 NORTH' and '10 SOUTH'.
The document period covers dates shortly before and after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody at MCC New York on August 10, 2019.
The log is routine personnel data and does not directly mention Jeffrey Epstein, his case, or specific events related to him.
